text: (napiye! Ippotirukkum umatu manaivikalukkup) pinnar, veru penkal (avarkalai ninkal tirumanam ceytukolla) umakku akumaka mattarkal. Melum, oru pennin alaku um'mai kavarntapotilum umatu manaivikalil evaraiyum nikki, atarkup patilaka avalai etuttuk kolvatum umakku akumakatu. Ayinum, umatu valakkaram contamakkik konta pen avvaralla. (Aval umakku akumanavale!) Allah anaittaiyum kavanittavanakave irukkiran
